it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful

Class TripRESTful

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.TripRESTful

  • @Path(value="/trip")
public class TripRESTful
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide all RESTful methods related to handle the users trips This RESTful resource will be hosted at the relative URI path "/trip"

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private User authenticatedUser
      User that performs a request, automatically injected after his authentication
      private TripManager tripManager
      Enterprise Java beans that offers the logic related to trip-related functionalities

    • Method Detail

      • postConstruct

        @PostConstruct
public void postConstruct()
        This method initialize the injected trip manager with the user to be handled It will be executed before any request is actually performed

      • getTickets

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTickets()
        Allows the user to retrieve all his saved tickets
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code and all the tickets of the user ( in the message body )

      • getCompatibleTickets

        @Path(value="/{travelComponentId}")
 @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCompatibleTickets(@PathParam(value="travelComponentId")
                                                                                                                                        long travelComponentId)
        Allows the user to obtain all the tickets that are compatible with the specified travel component
        Parameters:
        travelComponentId - identifier of the travel component
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code and all the compatible tickets of the user ( in the message body ) or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if the travel specified does not exist

      • addDistanceTicketMessage

        @Path(value="/distanceTicket")
 @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addDistanceTicketMessage(AddDistanceTicketMessage distanceTicketMessage)
        Allows the user to add a new distance ticket
        Parameters:
        distanceTicketMessage - message containing the info of the distance ticket to be inserted
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code otherwise ( that means there are invalid fields, the wrong ones are specified in the message body )

      • deleteTicket

        @Path(value="{ticketId}")
 @DELETE
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteTicket(@PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                         long ticketId)
        It deletes a ticket from the user personal tickets
        Parameters:
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket to be deleted
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if the specified profile does not exist

      • selectTicket

        @Path(value="/selectTicket/{ticketId}/{travelComponentId}")
 @PATCH
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response selectTicket(@PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                    long ticketId,
                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="travelComponentId")
                                                                                                                    long travelComponentId)
        It allows the user to associate a ticket to a travelComponent
        Parameters:
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket to be selected
        travelComponentId - identifier of the travelComponent to be associated with
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if one or both the ids are correct ( in the body is specified which fields are wrong )

      • deselectTicket

        @Path(value="/deselectTicket/{ticketId}/{travelComponentId}")
 @PATCH
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deselectTicket(@PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                              long ticketId,
                                                                                                                                                              @PathParam(value="travelComponentId")
                                                                                                                                                              long travelComponentId)
        It allows the user to de-associate a ticket to a travelComponent
        Parameters:
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket to be deselected
        travelComponentId - identifier of the travelComponent to be disassociated with
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if one or both the ids are correct ( in the body is specified which fields are wrong )

      • handleTicketSelection

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response handleTicketSelection(long ticketId,
                                                        long travelComponentId,
                                                        boolean isSelection)
        Handle the ticket selection/deselection since the message to be returned to the client are the same ones
        Parameters:
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket to be selected or deselected
        travelComponentId - identifier of the travelComponent to be associated/disassociated with
        isSelection - true if the ticket is to be selected, false otherwise
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if one or both the ids are correct ( in the body is specified which fields are wrong )

      • modifyDistanceTicketMessage

        @Path(value="/distanceTicket/{ticketId}")
 @PATCH
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response modifyDistanceTicketMessage(AddDistanceTicketMessage distanceTicketMessage,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                                                             long ticketId)
        Allows the user to modify a distance ticket
        Parameters:
        distanceTicketMessage - message containing the info of the distance ticket to be modified
        ticketId - identifier of the ticket to be modified
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code otherwise ( that means there are invalid fields, the wrong ones are specified in the message body if the body is empty the ticket does not exist)

      • buyTicket

        @Path(value="/buyTicket")
 @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response buyTicket()
        It allows the user to obtain the specific URLs where he can buy the tickets needed for a travel
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code and the requested URL or HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if the URL is not available
